AboutMeText: I am a dedicated Frontend Developer from Switzerland with extensive experience in developing user-friendly and responsive web applications. My technical expertise includes advanced knowledge in JavaScript, Angular, TypeScript, as well as HTML, CSS, SCSS, and Bootstrap. Through my studies at the Developer Academy, I have deepened my knowledge through project-based learning and successfully implemented over 15 projects, including a task management web app and interactive games. I combine this technical competence with strong soft skills such as teamwork, problem-solving ability, and creativity, which I developed in my previous career as a chef in a high-pressure kitchen environment. With this unique combination of skills, I am aiming for a position as a web developer in Zurich to develop and implement innovative technical solutions.
AboutMeText2: Disciplined and determined, I am a man who strives for continuous improvement and constant learning. Embracing growth as my personal philosophy, I am ready to take on any challenge that comes my way.
AboutMeText3: With a solid foundation in teamwork and an adaptable mindset, I possess the ability to thrive in fast-paced environments. My experience in the culinary field, where precision and timing are crucial, has prepared me to enter the world of web development with the same efficiency and attention to detail.

join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
elPoloLoco: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the endboss.
daBubble: DABubble is a business chat app, similar to Discord or Slack. The platform provides companies with an intuitive user interface for seamless communication and collaboration. With features like group chats, direct messages, and threads, DABubble enables efficient work and boosts team productivity.
